column2: the museum owns no paintings by my favorite artist
column4: they have plenty else to capture my fancy
column5: such as a few each of El Greco and Delacroix
column6: two of my lesser favorites.  To cite just a few
column7: I also love Milton Dictating to His Daughter by Henry Fuseli
column8: The Eruption of Vesuvius by Pierre-Jacques Volaire
column9: and the set of four huge canvases by Hubert Robert which depict contemporary Italian peasants going about their daily lives amidst vast Roman-era ruins (The Fountains
